tc_game_config_files.template: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" standalone="yes" ?> <config> <ID>$[Service.ServiceId]</ID> <!-- Number of server instance. Must be unique across one server and one DB engine --> <name>$[HostName]</name> <!-- No more than 63 symbols! --> <password>$[PrivatePassword]</password> <!-- will be required for new clients to join if not blank (no more than 32 symbols) --> <adminPassword>$[RConPassword]</adminPassword> <!-- GM password (no more than 32 symbols). If empty, GM Mode disabled --> <mode>![mode]</mode> <!-- Not Working --> <isPrivate>$[IsPrivate]</isPrivate> <!-- =1 Will not be listed in servers browser --> <isActive>1</isActive> <!-- Must be 1! (for internal use) --> <skillsStatsMult>![skillsStatsMult]</skillsStatsMult> <!-- =1 is vanilla MMO skills progression setting (range: 0.1 - 100) --> <skillcap> <group id="1" value="![skillcap1]" /> <!-- Crafting skills group skillcap. 600 is vanilla MMO skill cap (range: 200 - 3000) --> <group id="2" value="![skillcap2]" /> <!-- Combat skills group skillcap. 600 is vanilla MMO skill cap (range: 200 - 3000) --> <group id="3" value="![skillcap3]" /> <!-- Minor skills group skillcap. 600 is vanilla MMO skill cap (range: 200 - 3000) --> </skillcap> <terraformingSpeed>![terraformingSpeed]</terraformingSpeed> <!-- Terraforming speed during TUNNELING only. 0.8 is a vanilla setting. Can be raised up to 60, but only players with GM powers will be able to dig tunnels with a single iteration (range: 0.1 - 5) --> <craftingPeriod>![craftingPeriod]</craftingPeriod> <!-- seconds for 1 crafting tick (burning of fuel, heating of objects etc) (range: 1 - 3600) --> <animalBFPeriod>![animalBFPeriod]</animalBFPeriod> <!-- minutes between a breeding check. New harvest, dung and young animals will appear on that tick (range: 1 - 600) --> <dayCycle>![dayCycle]</dayCycle> <!-- Real life hours per in game day. Affects speed of crops and trees growth (range: 0.1 - 24) --> <animalsCount>![animalsCount]</animalsCount> <!-- WARNING! Big numbers might result a heavy server load. We'd recommend 50 or 100, but you can always experiment on your own hardware ;) Amount of animal spawn points and may result in a maximum of spawned animals at once. (range: 0 - 100) --> <maxPlayers>$[Service.Slots]</maxPlayers> <!-- Maximum amount of SIMULTANEOUS players on one server (range: 1 - 64) --> <port>$[Service.GamePort]</port> <!-- better have that port and +1 +2 port numbers opened and routed if needed. For instance, if you set that number for 26000, you will need to have 26001 and 26002 to be opened also. --> <objectDecayRate>![objectDecayRate]</objectDecayRate> <!-- Decay rate multiplayer for objects outside of the claim area. 0 by default - decay disabled (range: 0 - 10) --> <movableMaxDropHeightMeters>![movableMaxDropHeightMeters]</movableMaxDropHeightMeters> <!-- Allows you to restrict ability of players to hang logs, furniture and other movable objects in the air (range: 0 - 1000) --> <randomEventChanceWalk>![randomEventChanceWalk]</randomEventChanceWalk> <!-- Chance of occurrence of random event while player is traveling in a Peaceful stance around the world. 0 removes any random events while walking (range: 0 - 10) --> <randomEventChanceAbility>![randomEventChanceAbility]</randomEventChanceAbility> <!-- Chance of occurrence of random event while performing in game abilities (chopping trees, building objects etc.). 0 removes any random events for these operations (range: 0 - 10) --> <horsesDecayTimeMinutes>![horsesDecayTimeMinutes]</horsesDecayTimeMinutes> <!-- 0 = disabled (range: 0 - 35791) --> <homecomingDrop>![homecomingDrop]</homecomingDrop> <!-- 1/0. Determines whether homecoming will drop inventory. --> <judgementHour> <startTime>![judgementHour]</startTime> <!-- Local server real life time in HH:MM format, when Judgment Hour will start --> <weekSchedule> <!-- Weekly schedule that configures if Judgment Hour will be active at present day, or not --> <monday>![monday]</monday> <tuesday>![tuesday]</tuesday> <wednesday>![wednesday]</wednesday> <thursday>![thursday]</thursday> <friday>![friday]</friday> <saturday>![saturday]</saturday> <sunday>![sunday]</sunday> </weekSchedule> <duration>![duration]</duration> <!-- Judgment Hour duration in real life minutes --> </judgementHour> </config>

tc_game_mods.display_name: LiFx Full Server Fix & VIP System
tc_game_mods.comments: This is a server side mod that adds a VIP System to your Game Server
tc_game_mods.post_install_msg:
You have Installed the LiFx Full server Fix & Vip Mod successfully!



Please make sure to restart your server for it to load the new mod.

To USE this mod open your Database table "account" Set VIPFlag Column for the Account you wish to have as a VIP, Please check with the steam ID Before Issuing. When the server is full when a person with a vip flag attempts to join the server, any AFK Player will be removed from the game to allow VIP Access This is useful for heavily populated servers as alot of people will sit on the server afk for hours otherwise!

tc_game_mods.comments: This is a server side mod that grants offline protection to protect your guild claim in the event, you are unable to login.
tc_game_mods.post_install_msg:
You have Installed the LiFx Raid Protection Mod successfully!

Now your claims can be safe during Judgement hour.

Please make sure to restart your server for it to load the new mod.

To change the Activation Timer please change the AutoloadConfig.cs file located in your mods folder to the time frame which you would like.
